name: satiated

Add to word list

past simple and past participle of
satiate
to completely satisfy yourself or a need, especially with food or pleasure, so that you could not have any more: He drank greedily until his thirst was satiated. Synonyms
fill
sate formal or literary
satisfy (WANTING)
